1.title: Aurora, Colorado

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: An episode dedicated to the July 20, 2012 mass shooting at a Century 16 movie theater in Aurora, Colorado where 12 people were murdered & 70 were injured. This shooting occurred at a midnight film screening of 'The Dark Knight Rises'.

2.title: San Bernardino, California

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: An episode dedicated to the December 2, 2015 terrorist attack at a government building, Inland Regional Center, in San Bernardino, California where 14 people were murdered & 22 were injured.

3.title: Charleston, South Carolina

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: An episode dedicated to the June 17, 2015 hate crime that took place at Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (affectionately known as "Mother Emanuel" for its longstanding history in the community) in downtown Charleston, South Carolina whereas 9 people were murdered & 1 injured.

4.title: Washington, D.C.

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: An episode dedicated to the September 16, 2013 mass shooting that took place at the headquarters of the Naval Sea Systems Command (NAVSEA) inside the Washington Navy Yard in Washington, D.C. where 12 people were fatally shot and 3 injured.

5.title: Orlando, Florida

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: An episode devoted to the June 12, 2016 terrorist attack at Pulse, a gay nightclub in Orlando, Florida where 49 people were murdered & 58 people were injured. Until October 1, 2017, it had been the worst mass shooting in modern U.S. history.

6.title: Santa Monica, California

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: An episode dedicated to the June 7, 2013 spree killings that occurred near or on the campus of Santa Monica College in Santa Monica, California during which 5 people were fatally shot & 4 injured.

7.title: Oak Creek, Wisconsin

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: An episode dedicated to the August 5, 2012 hate crime that took place at The Sikh Temple of Wisconsin in Oak Creek, Wisconsin where 6 people were murdered & 4 injured.

8.title: Columbine, Colorado

episode of.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: An episode dedicated to the April 20, 1999 mass shooting that took place at Columbine High School in an unincorporated area of Jefferson County in Columbine, Colorado where 12 students and 1 teacher were murdered & 24 others injured. This shooting would become the basis for the way law enforcement across America would approach active shooter situations.

imdb.plot outline: Whether due to acts of terrorism, hate, or mental instability, mass shootings have become all too commonplace. This documentary series examines this disturbing phenomenon from the points of view of victims, family members, emergency medical workers and first responders, who bravely risk their own lives in the face of grave danger. Each episode recounts a specific incident using archival footage and in-depth interviews to shine a spotlight on the traumatic events and their aftermath. The results are powerful, eye-opening, and hopefully change-inducing.
imdb.title: Active Shooter: America Under Fire
akas: Active Shooter: America Under Fire (United States)
plot: Whether due to acts of terrorism, hate, or mental instability, mass shootings have become all too commonplace. This documentary series examines this disturbing phenomenon from the points of view of victims, family members, emergency medical workers and first responders, who bravely risk their own lives in the face of grave danger. Each episode recounts a specific incident using archival footage and in-depth interviews to shine a spotlight on the traumatic events and their aftermath. The results are powerful, eye-opening, and hopefully change-inducing.
